  • Annotation Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Column
    Describes a column of the table.
    ColumnRef
    Specifies columns in other annotations.
    Id
    Columns annotated with this annotation will be included in the primary key.
    Index
    Describes an index.
    Table
    Describes a table.
    Zone
    Describes a distribution zone.
